titles.title: To allow the counties of Hawaii, Maui, and Kauai to distribute grant funds received under section 106(d) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

bill.summary: 7/21/2003--Introduced. Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to revise community block grant allocation provisions with respect to States that have not elected to distribute such funds to local governments in nonentitlement areas as of December 31, 2003.
